title: Inside Europe: 15.09.2022
description: Ukraine recaptures vast swathes of territory from Russia, Belarusian exiles in Poland support Kyiv over the war, and the Brussels terror attacks trial begins. Also: Why the former Czech prime minister is in the dock and Britain mourns an iconic monarch.
itunes:author: DW.COM | Deutsche Welle
itunes:keywords: Inside Europe, Helen Seeney, Ukraine war, Kharkiv, Queen Elizabeth II, Brussels terror attacks, Italy elections, Giorgia Meloni, Andrej Babis, Belarusian dissidents, Maelbeek
